This object is from the complete CNMAT Max/MSP/Jitter package which can be found at http://cnmat.berkeley.edu/patch/4029

Copy OSC-route.mxo to your max external folder… e.g. /applications/max5/cycling '74/max-externals

Copy OSC-route.maxhelp to your max help folder… e.g. /applications/max5/cycling '74/max-help

Enjoy!
